title: Climbing coach, Kharkiv
description: Developed an exercise program for clients. Conducted group and individual trainings. Conducted individual training with about100 clients, 60% achieved corresponding success.Worked with professional athlete and other coaches.

title: Travel organizer, Kharkiv
description: Compiled a travel program for kayaking, climbing, hiking and skiing. I bought tickets, created programs for recreation, and as a result of all the trips, no one had any injuries.
